BrynnesMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
BrynnesMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

BrynnesMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
BrynnesMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
BrynnesMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

BrynnesMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
BrynnesMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

BrynnesMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
BrynnesMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !BrynnesMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

BrynnesMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
BrynnesMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !BrynnesMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
